Uses of Class
mdd.Node

  • Packages that use Node 
    Package Description
    core  
    heuristics  
    mdd  

    • Uses of Node in core

      Methods in core that return Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node Problem.merge(Node[] nodes)
      Given a set of nodes, returns a new node with a State and a value leading to a relaxed MDD.
      Node Problem.root()
      Returns the initial node of the problem i. e. the empty assignment.
      Node Solver.solve()
      Solves the problem with no timeout.
      Node Solver.solve(int timeLimit)
      Solves the given maximization problem with the given heuristics and returns the optimal solution if it exists.
      Methods in core that return types with arguments of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Node> Problem.successors(Node node, Variable var)
      Given a node and a variable, returns the list of nodes reached after having assigned the variable to every possible value.
      Methods in core with parameters of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node Problem.merge(Node[] nodes)
      Given a set of nodes, returns a new node with a State and a value leading to a relaxed MDD.
      List<Node> Problem.successors(Node node, Variable var)
      Given a node and a variable, returns the list of nodes reached after having assigned the variable to every possible value.

    • Uses of Node in heuristics

      Methods in heuristics that return Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node[] MinRankDeleteSelector.select(Layer layer, int number) 
      Node[] MergeSelector.select(Layer layer, int number)
      Selects the nodes to be merged in order to relax the MDD.
      Node[] MinRankMergeSelector.select(Layer layer, int number) 
      Node[] DeleteSelector.select(Layer layer, int number)
      Selects the nodes to be deleted in order to restrict the MDD.
      Node[] SimpleDeleteSelector.select(Layer layer, int number) 
      Node[] SimpleMergeSelector.select(Layer layer, int number) 

    • Uses of Node in mdd

      Fields in mdd with type parameters of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Set<Node> MDD.frontier 
      Methods in mdd that return Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node Layer.best()
      Returns the best node of the layer, the one with maximum longest-path value.
      Node Node.getSuccessor(State state, double value, int id, int val)
      Utility function to build a new node from this one, with one more variable bound.
      Node MDD.solveExact()
      Solves the given problem starting from the given node.
      Node MDD.solveRelaxed(int width)
      Solves the given problem starting from the given node with layers of at most width nodes by merging some nodes and thus providing a solution not always feasible.
      Node MDD.solveRestricted(int width)
      Solves the given problem starting from the given node with layers of at most width nodes by deleting some nodes and thus providing a feasible solution.
      Methods in mdd that return types with arguments of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<Node> MDD.exactCutset()
      Returns an exact cutset of the current MDD tree.
      Set<Node> Node.exactParents() 
      Collection<Node> Layer.nodes()
      Returns a Set of all nodes contained in the layer.
      Methods in mdd with parameters of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Layer.addNode(Node node)
      Adds nodes to the layer or updates an existing node in the layer with the same State.
      void Node.addParent(Node node)
      Adds an exact parent to the node
      int Node.compareTo(Node o)
      Comparison based on the State rank.
      double State.rank(Node node)
      Function assigning a rank to each node of a layer used to determine which nodes to delete/merge in restricted/relaxed decision diagrams.
      void Layer.removeNodes(Node[] nodes)
      Remove the nodes from the layer.
      void Layer.removeNodes(Node[] nodes, Set<Node> frontier)
      Remove the nodes from the layer.
      void MDD.setInitialNode(Node initialNode)
      Sets the initial state of the MDD representation.
      void Node.update(Node other)
      Updates the node given another node with the same State.
      Method parameters in mdd with type arguments of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Layer.removeNodes(Node[] nodes, Set<Node> frontier)
      Remove the nodes from the layer.
      Constructors in mdd with parameters of type Node 
      Constructor and Description
      Layer(Problem problem, MDD mdd, Node node, int number)
      Returns a layer containing the given node.
